lowTemperatureAlarm.title: Low Temperature Alarm
lowTemperatureAlarm.description: Indicates if a low temperature alarm is active.

highTemperatureAlarm.title: High Temperature Alarm
highTemperatureAlarm.description: Indicates if a high temperature alarm is active.

lowHumidityAlarm.title: Low Humidity Alarm
lowHumidityAlarm.description: Indicates if a low humidity alarm is active.

highHumidityAlarm.title: High Humidity Alarm
highHumidityAlarm.description: Indicates if a high humidity alarm is active.
